response.original_title: Billionaire Radical: George Soros and the Scheme to Remake America
response.overview: It is the world’s most untold story.  It seems like anarchy has descended upon virtually every aspect of American life. And yet there is a vital thread holding it all together: an enormous flow of funding coming from radical Leftist billionaire George Soros, among others. Who is this mysterious figure, George Soros? And what effect does he have on your country—and your life? This hard-hitting documentary takes a rare look at this billionaire radical—a look that is critically important in this pivotal and tumultuous year in our nation.
response.tagline: Billionaire financier George Soros has put his fingerprints on virtually every Leftist project in the world today.
response.title: Billionaire Radical: George Soros and the Scheme to Remake America
